Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{3: 'You spot something rather unusual on the street.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Mini Asslam... Mini Asslam...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Sponsored by the ACA, the Mini Asslam is preparing for departure...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Last call for boarding! Passengers onboard, please secure yourselves to avoid any mishaps!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia is holding a sign with both hands right in the middle of the street. Behind her, a line of children are making playful faces.'}
{3: "The first child is clinging to Sophia's mechanical arm, with the others holding onto the shoulders of the child in front, forming a long line."}
{3: 'Parents on either side of the line are chatting and laughing.'}
{3: 'Checking for stragglers, Sophia then notices you.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Good evening, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Good evening.', 3: '16'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'This is the remarkable Mini Asslam, courtesy of the esteemed ACA.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I offer personalized tours of Constellia's renowned shops, complete with detailed explanations and exceptional service.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Care to join us, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Children under four feet travel free, but a 50% service charge applies to adults.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unfortunately, my finances are rather limited at the moment.', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I see. The train's about to pull out. Watch yourself, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You step back to make room, watching Sophia lead a long line forward.'}
{3: 'The line of children explodes in giggles and laughter.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "Didn't peg the ACA for such philanthropy.", 3: '28'}
{3: 'Just as you are wrapping your head around it, the child-train led by Sophia veers off to a block on the left.'}
{3: "That's where all the Akdilek toy stores and candy stalls are."}
{3: "The shopkeepers' faces light up with sly smiles as the gaggle of children approaches."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "So, that's their game, huh?", 3: '34'}
{3: 'You follow the train for a while, passing through several areas, until someone else takes the reins from Sophia.'}
{3: 'After handing off the sign, she saunters back toward you.'}
{2: 'Wrapped up your shift?', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Sales are on target, but my work's not quite done.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I have one last VIP to take care of.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia bows to you, then turns around.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Sophia of Akdilek Commercial Alliance's Asslam at your service.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "The train's about to depart, so hop aboard quickly!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Does she want you to line up behind her?'}
{3: 'You are hardly a kid anymore. This feels a little... awkward.'}
{2: "I can't exactly afford the ticket price.", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'This is a special train, tickets are on the house.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, fine.', 3: '47'}
{3: "It'd be rude to say no after all that."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "The train's about to depart. Please grab a handrail for safety.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Remembering the children, you grab her mechanical arms instead.'}
{3: "Instead of her mechanical arms, you grab Sophia's hands instead."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Jamilah always said... precious guests deserve a special kind of welcome.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I... not sure "special" is the word I\'d use.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "If you don't feel like it, I can switch anytime.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You master the four-finger clasp, just like Sophia. You link hands like train cars chugging along.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Constellia's commercial street... So, Commandant, where is our next stop of your choice?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Well, then... wherever you choose, Sophia.', 3: '61'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I choose?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'There are... two, actually.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "One we've already arrived at.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The other... well, that lies in a future yet unseen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'You certain about this, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This could be a lengthy journey.', 3: '67'}
{2: "Since the ride's on you, I'm not getting off until the final destination, no matter the distance."}
